errors.version_mismatch_msg: WSRX version is too low, please update to the latest version before using platform integration.
errors.daemon_unavailable_msg: The WSRX daemon is not running. If the desktop client has started, please check whether the WSRX control address in the platform settings is correct.
errors.daemon_error_msg: Please check the WSRX software log and report the issue.
errors.unknown_error_msg: An unknown error occurred while calling the WSRX API.
